name: 朱憲國
objective:
半導體廠營運管理及製造技術這門課分為兩個部分；營運管理部分的課程內容主要是以IE的角度，探討IE在半導體廠中可以參與什麼樣的營運活動，其內容包含如供應鏈管理、產能規劃、成本分析、預算管理、建廠專案管理及策略規劃等。第二部分介紹晶圓廠相關製造技術，包含晶圓廠概論、製程開發、模組技術、資訊技術、智慧製造、先進製程控制及錯誤偵測等。

講師期藉分享自身在半導體業多年之實務工作經驗，幫助學生建立在未來進入半導體製造業之相關背景知識。

This lecture includes two segments. For “Semiconductor Operation Management”, a few popular topics will be addressed from I.E. point of view in a semiconductor company such as “Supply Chain Management”, “Capacity Planning”, “Cost Analysis”, “Budget Management”, “Construction and Project Planning” and “Strategic Planning” etc. For “Wafer Manufacturing Technology”, some state-of-the-art topics will be addressed. Included are “Introduction of wafer fab”, “Process Technology Development”, “Module Process Technology” , “IT Technology”, “Smart Manufacturing” and “Fault Detection and Classification” etc. 

Instructors will share their personal experiences in practice and help students to establish background knowledge before entering the industry.

name: 簡文勝
objective:
半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術這門課分為兩個部分；營運管理部分的課程內容主要是以IE的角度，探討IE在半導體廠中可以參與什麼樣的營運活動，其內容包含的課題如供應鏈管理、產能規劃、成本分析、預算管理、建廠及設施規劃、專案管理、策略規劃、技術移轉及開發管理以及合約及商業談判等。講師以其自身的經歷，提供給同學不同於教科書上的實務經驗。第二部分將以先進製造技術專題的方式講授，包含批次控制、虛擬量測、錯誤偵測、高混線生產等議題。
This lecture includes two segments. For “Operation Management”, a few popular topics will be addressed from I.E. point of view in a semiconductor company such as “Supply Chain Management”, “Capacity Planning”, “Cost Analysis”, “Budget Management”, “Construction and Facility Planning”, “Strategic Planning”, “Management in Technology Transfer and Development” and “Agreement and Business Negotiation”, etc. Instructor will share his personal experiences in practice which are quite different from the textbooks. For “Advanced Manufacturing Technology”, some state-of-the-art APC topics will be addressed. Included are “R2R Control”, “Virtual Metrology”, “Fault Detection”, “High-Mix Product Control”, among others.
